name: inclusive
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: An inclusive price or amount includes everything.

example.eg: My rent is $700 a month inclusive (of bills).
example.egtrans: 我的租金是每月700美元全包。

trans_examp.trans_en: including the first and last date or number stated
trans_examp.trans_cn: 包括首尾两天（或两个数字）的

example.eg: I'll be away from 20 to 31 May inclusive.
example.egtrans: 我将于5月20日（含）至31日（含）外出。

trans_examp.trans_en: An inclusive group or organization tries to include many different types of people and treat them all fairly and equally.
trans_examp.trans_cn: （团体或组织）可以包容各种人的

example.eg: Our aim is to create a fairer, more inclusive society.
example.egtrans: 我们的目标是建立一个更公平、更具包容性的社会。
